hero.title: Manage your inventory like a pro.
hero.subtitle: The complete inventory management platform that optimizes your stocks using artificial intelligence.

features.title: Key Inventory Management Features
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed to meet all your inventory management needs

productManagement.title: Product Management
productManagement.description: Easily manage your SKUs, variants, photos and attributes for perfect organization of your catalog.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-time Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Monitor all inbound, outbound and stock movements with absolute precision and in real time.

alertsHistory.title: Stock Alerts
alertsHistory.description: Receive automatic notifications for low stock levels and access the complete history of movements.

multiWarehouse.title: Multi-warehouse
multiWarehouse.description: Manage multiple warehouses and storage locations with a clear, centralized overview.

barcodes.title: Barcodes & QR Codes
barcodes.description: Generate and print labels with barcodes or QR codes for fast, error-free inventory.

stockMovements.title: Stock Movements
stockMovements.description: Facilitate transfers between warehouses and track each movement with complete traceability.

automation.title: Intelligent Automation
automation.subtitle: Reduce your manual tasks and integrate your favorite tools for smooth inventory management

autoOrders.title: Automatic Orders
autoOrders.subtitle: Intelligent replenishment
autoOrders.description: The system automatically triggers supplier orders when your stock reaches a critical threshold, customizable by product or category.

integrations.title: Complete Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect all your tools
integrations.description: Integrate StockSense with your existing systems: ERP, CRM, e-commerce, accounting for a seamless ecosystem.

api.title: Open API
api.subtitle: Total customization
api.description: Our documented RESTful API makes it easy to integrate StockSense with any third-party application or internal development.

mobile.title: Your inventory in your pocket
mobile.subtitle: The StockSense mobile app allows you to keep control of your inventory wherever you are. View, scan and manage your stock on the go.

stockConsult.title: Mobile Consultation
stockConsult.description: Access all your stock, orders and alerts from your smartphone or tablet, with a mobile-optimized interface.

scanning.title: Intelligent Scanning
scanning.description: Scan barcodes and QR codes directly from your smartphone to add, remove or check products in seconds.

notifications.title: Real-time Notifications
notifications.description: Receive instant alerts for important events: stock-outs, deliveries, detected anomalies.

security.title: Enhanced Collaboration and Security
security.subtitle: Work together securely with granular access controls and complete traceability

roleManagement.title: Role and Permission Management
roleManagement.description: Define precisely who can view and modify which data. Create custom roles tailored to each function in your company.

auditHistory.title: Complete History and Audit
auditHistory.description: Track every action performed in the system with timestamps and user IDs for complete traceability and increased accountability.

authentication.title: Enhanced Authentication
authentication.description: Maximum protection with two-factor authentication (2FA), SSO, and compliance with the strictest security standards on the market.

dashboard.title: Dashboards and Custom Reports
dashboard.subtitle: Visualize all your key data and make informed decisions with our intuitive and customizable dashboards.

realTimeView.title: Real-time Overview
realTimeView.description: View the status of your inventory, sales and orders on a centralized dashboard updated in real time.

export.title: Multi-format Export
export.description: Easily export your data and reports in CSV, PDF or Excel formats to share or integrate them into other tools.

keyIndicators.title: Key Indicators
keyIndicators.description: Track your most important KPIs: best-selling products, inventory turnover, inventory value, stock-out forecasts.

analysis.title: Intelligent Data Analysis
analysis.subtitle: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to optimize your inventory management

advancedStats.title: Advanced Statistics
advancedStats.description: Analyze your sales, returns, stock-outs and stock values in depth with interactive and customizable visualizations.

prediction.title: Demand Prediction
prediction.description: Anticipate sales peaks and avoid stock-outs with our machine learning algorithms that analyze your historical data.

costAnalysis.title: Cost and Margin Analysis
costAnalysis.description: Automatically calculate your gross and net margins, compare your suppliers and identify cost anomalies.

customerBehavior.title: Behavioral Analysis
customerBehavior.description: Segment your customers (RFM), assign scores and anticipate their future purchases for relevant recommendations.

dashboard.title: Interactive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Customize your analysis experience with filters by date, product or warehouse for precise and actionable insights.

chatbot.title: Integrated NLP Chatbot
chatbot.description: Ask questions in natural language like 'Which products are out of stock?' and get instant answers.

automation.title: Automation & Intelligent Alerts
automation.description: Create your own automation rules and receive personalized alerts via Slack, email or push notifications. The system learns from your habits for increasingly relevant suggestions.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Companies of all sizes trust StockSense to optimize their inventory management

quotes.quote: Since we've been using StockSense, our stock-outs have decreased by 78% and our turnover has improved by 24%. Predictive analysis has allowed us to optimize our orders and reduce our storage costs.
quotes.author: Marie Durand

quotes.quote: The flexibility of StockSense has allowed us to adapt the system to our specific processes. Integration with our ERP was quick and the technical support is exceptional.
quotes.author: Thomas Moreau

quotes.quote: The integrated chatbot is revolutionary. I can instantly get crucial information about our inventory without having to navigate through complex reports. A real time-saver on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Sophie Lefebvre

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about StockSense

questions.question: How does StockSense protect my sensitive data?
questions.answer: We use bank-level encryption to protect your data. All information is encrypted at rest and in transit. We conduct regular security audits and comply with GDPR, SOC 2 and ISO 27001 standards.

questions.question: Can I integrate StockSense with my current system?
questions.answer: Absolutely! StockSense integrates easily with most ERPs, CRMs and e-commerce platforms. We offer ready-to-use connectors for popular systems and an open API for custom integrations.

questions.question: How long does it take to set up StockSense?
questions.answer: The majority of our clients are operational in less than 2 weeks. Our onboarding team guides you through every step, from importing your data to configuring your custom settings and training your teams.

questions.question: Is StockSense suitable for small businesses?
questions.answer: StockSense is designed to adapt to all activity volumes. Many SMEs use our solution and benefit from an excellent return on investment through inventory optimization and reduction of manual errors.

questions.question: How do AI-based predictions work?
questions.answer: Our algorithms analyze your sales history, seasonal trends, external events and other factors to predict future demand. The more you use StockSense, the more accurate the predictions become thanks to continuous learning.

questions.question: Do you offer assistance in case of problems?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer email support for all our customers, and priority support with access to a dedicated account manager for Intelligence plan customers. Our average response time is less than 4 hours during business days.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that meets your needs, with no hidden fees

standardPlan.title: Standard Plan
features: Offered at €29/user / year for 10 of your users

footer.readyText: Ready to revolutionize your inventory management?
footer.joinText: Join thousands of companies optimizing their operations with StockSense.
footer.description: The intelligent inventory management platform that transforms your supply chain.
